attributes.action: No confidence vote : resign and call election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to certain rescent failing within the government and it's procedures and the fact that the PM has no knowledge of whats going on in his own government, I would like a vote of no confidence to force and election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
